column1: good length, slanted across, caught in two minds as to whether leave or play and ends up knocking it a tad inadvertently to third man
just short of a good length, pitching outside off and seaming away, left alone
seams away off a length from outside off, left alone
misjudgment from Finch! Shoulders arms to a short of a length delivery that causes a puff of dust to go up and cuts in super sharply to hit Finch's pad. Extra bounce saves him
straight lines outside off, left alone
Finch nicks but falls short of Rohit at first slip. Gets a tad squared up as he defends this length ball, subtle movements are causing trouble.They're magnified when you're out of form
length ball outside off, defended
good length, angled across off, punchily blocked towards point
shortish, cuts away farther away from him, drags a pull from well outside his reach and sends it through midwicket. Easily gets on top of the bounce because of the gentle pace

Jadeja has a shy at the stumps and misses! Carey is squared up as he closes the face and gets a leading edge towards point. Finch takes off for a single and is sent back. Boy is he struggling on all fronts
throws his hands at a wide fuller ball and misses
late seam away from a length just outside off, left alone
walks a step or two forward and flicks through midwicket
short of a length, tries to tuck it away but gets tucked up and wears it on the hips
back of a length, tucked off the hips to square leg
sticks the bat out a tad away from the body and the ball angles in to go to midwicket off the inside edge

gone, Carey's nicked off to second slip Some inconsistent bounce playing on the minds of the batsmen here. Beautiful bowling by Bhuvi as well. Short of good length, kicks up a little more than he may have anticipated, and it straightens just enough to shave the outside edge. This time, because of the bounce, it carries to Kohli. Even so, he had to get down full tilt to hold onto it
shuffles across to a length ball and keeps it out down the pitch
full, swinging in, rolls off a thick inside edge to fine leg
short of a length, nips away late, Khawaja shoulders arms
angled across sharply and jags further away after landing, Khawaja jabs hard at it and gets beaten
short of a length, moves away, Khawaja flashes at it and gets beaten again
back of a length outside off, this time he defends off the middle of the bat into the off side
movement off the deck again, hangs back and pokes at it and the ball goes past the outside edge
good length, cuts in towards off, presses forward and defends down the ground
another big stride forward as he defends
fully forward as he plays late through backward point
short of length, angled in, tucked off the pads to midwicket
full, a set of stumps outside off, left alone
short of a length outside off, moves slightly back and defends to short cover
back of a length, angled across, stabbed to point
variable bounce again, Khawaja looks to pull this back of a length delivery but it keeps low and sneaks under the bat before thudding into the left thigh
short, too much width this time, arches back to free those arms and slaps it through point
just fuller of a good length, late movement towards off, Khawaja covers for it and defends down the ground
short, wide, cracked off the backfoot to point
length, shuffles across and keeps it out into the covers
fuller around off, driven into the covers
shot! Overpitched outside off, just leans into it a tad to drive through the covers. Pulled back before the boundary
outside edge, past first slip's right. Cuts away off the seam and Finch is jabbing at it, gets a healthy nick but survives
defended down the track
this one moves back in and lobs away towards third man off the pad as Finch misses the flick
another edge that doesn't carry. Khawaja pushes at a full awayswinger and Kohli gets down to his left but the ball drops short and skips past him
that's a pristine drive. Gently pushed off the front foot right between cover and extra cover
short of good length outside off, defended towards point
full outside off, throws his hands at it and slaps it to point
full, opens up and slashes wildly but the ball moves back in late to leave him beaten
fullish outside off, driven into the covers with a neat stride forward
ooh, prodigious late swing, goes away from Khawaja, just a little too wide in the first place to make him play
full outside off, blocked to cover
fuller on off, driven neatly to mid-off
fuller of a length, tails away late, left alone outside off
full outside off, walks across and leans into a drive towards mid-off
gets a long stride across and defends close to the pad

and after all that, Bhuvneshwar has his man. Finch's hardwork comes to an end. It's the inswinger again. It's given him a miserable tome and continues to do so. He's way forward and crouching to defend but the ball finds a way to nip in and hit him on the kneeroll
short of a length outside off, opens the face and runs it down to third man
back of a length, nipping away, left alone
short, loads of width, punched off the backfoot through the gap at point
tails away late outside off and left alone
full, swings away towards off, defended
short of a length, goes over the top of off as he shoulders arms
short of a length, tucked towards midwicket
short of a length, pitching outside leg, tries to tuck it away and wears it high on the pad
good length on middle and leg, defended down the pitch
short of a length, skips down leg as he looks to glance it away
short of a length outside off, defended late to point
short, a tad wide, Marsh slaps it hard but point intercepts it brilliantly with a dive
back of a length, slid in, tucked into the on side
back of a length on middle and leg, backs away and punches it down to long-on
looped up outside off, offers width, drilled through point
pitched up outside off, crunched through point
looped in towards off, driven out off the front foot
full, driven to sweeper cover
short, angled across off, gets on top of it and blocks to point
length, angled across, slapped through the gap at extra cover
full on middle and leg, pushed straight back
length on middle and off, defends late through point
fuller around leg stump, tries to flick and gets an inside edge to the pad
flat, round-arm fuller one on middle, driven back
oh jeez! Had Marsh do all sorts of things there. Came down the track, then saw how flat it was and pushed back, the back leg came across as the bat came down and after all that he made no contact
full, driven through cover
a bit of turn from a short of a length, slapped to deep cover
flat and full on leg, driven to long-on
short, pulled to midwicket
full outside off, carved away to cover
shortish, angled across, opens the face and runs it down to third man
short of a length, pitching outside leg, tries to tuck it away and wears it on the thigh
fuller around middle, defended back
full, angled across, gets an inside edge to the left of the stumps as he reaches out
angled into leg, he clips this nicely behind square, past short fine for a couple
dropped by Dhoni! This was drifting in outside off, just a hint of turn, he drives gets a thin edge and Dhoni drops it! It was straight forward
fuller on off, he pushes back to the bowler
shorter length, he tries to pull and gets a bottom edge onto pad!
shorter again, he's back and mistiming a pull to long on
short outside off, he late cuts with a dab fine of third man
121kph, on the hip, he glances this off the back foot easily to fine leg
back of a length on middle, he's back and defending with the full face
123kph, short ball and he's back and cracking a pull shot over midwicket! Finally a boundary and some relief for Marsh
122kph, good length on middle and off, he defends from the crease into the off side
124kph, half-volley outside leg, he tries to whip and misses, it comes off pad and rolls away for a leg bye
good length on off, he turns this to midwicket
79kph, short and wide, he cuts to deep point, not well timed but they get one
81kph, round arm slung into off stump, he's back and punching to long on
79kph, shorter length, he pulls hard at midwicket and Rohit makes a good save knocking it down. Saved multiple runs
short and wide, he late cuts straight to backward point
reaches outside off to sweep, gets a top edge that hangs in the air awhile, but it's well short of the man in the deep
tossed up outside off, it grips and spins past the edge! Beautifully bowled. Marsh dragged his foot out but got it back quickly before Dhoni could gets the bails off
91kph, flatter outside off, he pushes back to the bowler
92kph, shorter, he's back and glancing just past leg slip, through the legs of Kohli, they get a couple
fuller on middle, he clips this behind square, pushes for two but it's not on
fired down the leg side, called wide
darted into leg stump, takes him on the thigh pad and drops down
92kph, good length on off, he defends from the crease
pitching on leg, spinning down, he misses a pull, called wide
full on middle and leg, he clips through forward square
83kph, short drag down, Marsh is back and pounding a pull shot over midwicket to the fence! Nearly went for six, he hit it that well
81kph, shorter length on off, he's back giving room and punching nicely past cover, well placed, they run well as it splits deep cover and deep long off
pushed through outside off, he cuts to cover-point and they take a tight one on Jadeja
88kph short again, he's back and pulling well over midwicket, no man back there, one bounce four! Marsh starting to jump on the loose ones here
79kph, short outside off, he cuts to Jadeja on the circle, he misfield and allows one
flighted, but still wide, he's back and late cutting past short third man and they get a couple more
full into middle, he clips this nicely through square leg to the gap in the outfield, they run well for two
wide of the crease, angled into off, he turns this with the spin to midwicket
shorter on off, he's back and tucking this behind square easily
angled down leg, he shaped to reverse sweep, missed, Dhoni misses it down the leg side, he got a touch, they get two extra runs on top of the wide. That was called runs! I'm not sure he hit that
another one fired down leg
91kph, leg stump, he whips behind square for a single
94kph, shorter length on off, he's back and tucking this behind square
short outside off, he cuts in the air towards backward point but just wide of him and they get a couple
darted into off, he's back and defending
angled into leg, he clips this through forward square
very round arm delivery, angled into middle and leg, he pushes this to long on
77kph, full on off, pushed to cover
tossed up outside off, he leaves this alone
this goes down leg again
good length on off, he turns this to midwicket
attempted reverse sweep, he gloves it towards short third man
nails the reverse sweep this time forward of point! Cracking shot. From off middle stump he smoked that to the point fence
good length on middle, he's back and defending to midwicket
shorter on leg, he's back and clipping this behind square to the man in the deep
93kph, tossed up on off, he skips down and drives, bouncing it back over the bowler's head to long on
leg break on off, 82kph, he's back and pushing back to the bowler

Stumped off a wide down leg! Leg break wide down leg, he skipped early, missed it by a long way trying to whip it behind square, Dhoni gets down the leg side, takes it, doesn't get the bails off as quick as normal but he gets them off in time! Marsh was just short of getting back!
good length leg break, 78kph, on middle, he's back and punching back to the bowler
looped up on off, he skips down and pushes this to long off

caught and bowled! Soft leading edge! Shorter length leg break down leg, he is back and trying to work it behind square, closed the face too early, gets a thick leading edge that just lobs back to the bowler. Khawaja just watches it painfully as it slowly lands in Chahal's waiting hands!
wrong un, 78kph, spinning into the front pad but it was going down
78kph leg break, he's back, it just sticks in the surface a touch, he pushes into the off side
full into leg stump, he clips this firmly past midwicket, they push for three to the big boundary but only get two
pushed through outside off, 92kph, he pushes at it, but it spins past the outside edge
tossed up wide of off, he reaches out and defends into the off side
full wide of off, he drives firmly through cover, well placed, long off has to run around to cut it off
short on the back foot he cuts behind point to the man on the circle
94kph, shorter on off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
leg break pitching outside leg but spinning, he's back and defending
78kph, tossed very high outside off, he drives very firmly to long off
81kph, fuller outside off, he drives along the ground to long off
shorter wide of off, he cuts hard to deep point
leg stump line, he's back and working this against the turn behind square
tossed up outside off, spinning away, he leaves this alone
full outside off, 91kph, he drives firmly to long off
90kph, thrown way wide of off, he leaves this alone
92kph, tossed up outside off, he pushes this to cover
92kph, pushed through of off, he plays a front foot defence
91kph, good length on off, he's back and defending to cover
darted through on off, 96kph, he defends from the crease back to the bowler
tossed up, he skips down and drives to Jadeja on the circle at mid on and takes him on, Handscomb passed the crease line but took awhile to get his bat down. But the throw was wide
tossed up on middle, he drives firmly straight of mid on and it beats Jadeja! Just enough pace on the shot to beat him diving to his left
good length on middle, he's back and pushing back to the bowler
leg break outside off, he defends to cover
leg break outside off, he's happy to leave this alone
78kph, leg break, good length on off, he defends on the front foot
tossed up outside off, he opens the face and square drives through point to the sweeper
shorter length wide of off, he's back and punching through cover-point to the sweeper
91kph, fuller wide of off, he drives firmly to deep cover-point
92kph, shorter on off, he's back and pushing to backward point, he looks for one but it's not there
edged just past slip! This ripped across him, some proper turn, he closed the face, got a thick edge but it ran well wide of slip, they run well to get three
fuller on middle, he drives firmly to long on
84kph, shorter outside off, he's back and forcing to point with an open face
79kph leg break looped outside off, he drives against the turn to long on

caught at slip! Brilliant leg spin bowling! This was a fizzing leg break, drifting into middle and leg, it spun, Stoinis was back, closing the face trying to push into the leg side, it catches the edge and Rohit dives low to his right at slip to pouch the catch! Superb bowling
83kph, leg break on middle, he stretches forward and defends
85kph, leg break on off, he drives down to long off
82kph, full on off, almost yorker length, he jams it out
good length on off, he defends to cover
tossed up wide of off, he drives to deep cover-point
tossed up on off, he drives to long on
fuller outside off, he leans into a square drive placing it to the sweeper
flatter on off, he is driving again down to long on
91kph, good length spinning away, he pushes to cover
tossed up outside off, he drives to long on
tossed up on middle and leg, he drives back past the bowler to long on
drifting into middle, he drives firmly but straight to midwicket
leading edge chipped high but just out of reach of Vijay Shankar running back! it was a good effort running back but he got just enough bat on it to clear him
short ball, dragged down, he's back and pulling easily over midwicket into the gap and away to the rope!
good length, spinning leg break, he's back and punching this to cover
shorter and wide, he late cuts nicely just past slip, fine of short third man but it doesn't have enough pace on it to go past the ring
tossed up on off, he slices a drive to cover-point
short and Maxwell pounces, he's back and slapping a pull shot into the vacant midwicket that was left open to tempt him! Poor ball from Jadeja
tossed up on off, he presses forward and opens the face pushing this into the gap at cover-point
tossed up on off, he drives back to the bowler
shorter and wider, he's back and cutting through cover-point to the sweeper
shorter length, he's back and chipping this in the air just over straight midwicket, down to long on. It was well out of reach of the fielder
full toss and hammered over midwicket! No one back and he just clubs this into the vacant region at midwicket
leg break, good length on middle, he defends on the front foot
leg break looped up on middle and leg, he drives nicely to long on
good length leg break, he skips down to the pitch and pushes firmly to long on
leg break looped up wide of off, he reaches out and places an exceptional drive wide of cover, timed well enough to reach the rope! Deep point had no chance! Great stroke
and gives away some width outside off first up, allowing Handscomb to lace a cut through backward point
short of a length on off, drops it into the covers for one
fuller around the fifth-stump line, jabbed back at Shami
pulls compulsively with no room to free those arms, a wild swing, gives him a top-edged four over the keeper's head
short again, but this one climbs at pace and angles in, forcing him to arch away. Bounce deemed too high

Maxwell's holed out here. India went in with a clear plan to him. Shami played on his natural instincts to pull and bangs this in short again. Maxwell can't control the hook, gets another thick top-edge, this one sails fine and Bhuvneshwar Kumar latches on brilliantly, sprinting forward from the deep and diving in front for a well-judged catch
short of a length on middle and off, tucked between mid-on and midwicket for a quick one
full on middle and leg, driven down the ground
reaches out and pushes this through point
drifts this outside off and gets it to turn away, making him reach out and get an outside edge to the third man boundary
pitched up and slid in outside off, driven out through the cover-point region
short of length, spinning away outside off, shifts back and punches down to long-on
short, moves across early and waits on the backfoot before pulling behind square. Direct hit at Shami's end causes some momentary excitement but he's well inside. Little casual, though
short around off, gets on top of the bounce and runs it down to third man
full outside off, shuffles across and clips to deep midwicket for a brace
fuller of a length outside off, chops it into the surface as he opens the face late
flashes at a fuller one outside off and nearly nicks through to the keeper
full outside off, driven through the covers, to the right of the sweeper
nicely played. Waits for this fuller one to come on and opens the face to steer it away to third man
back of a length outside off, defended towards point
full outside off, pushed straight back and Vijay dives to his left to stop it clean
back of a length outside off, shuffles and defends
short of good length, tucked off the hips behind square leg
length outside off, opens the face to third man
full outside off, driven down the ground
fuller on middle, pushed out towards extra cover
full, curving in towards middle, driven off the front foot and mid-on cuts it off to his left
full, played late with an open face to point's left
fuller of a length, comes on dead straight around a sixth-stump channel and shoots past the outside edge
fuller, driven to point
back of a length, tucked with the angle to midwicket
walks across to a length ball and tries to flick but the ball hits the pad outside off
full outside off, heaves it away from outside off over the midwicket region. Wristy
short of a length outside off, pulled in front of square for one
full, swinging away from pretty wide outside off, outside the line
full outside off, plays loosely at it and chops it into the surface
back of a length outside off, worked down to long-on for one
full outside off, pushed into the off side
back of a length outside off, defended to point
full, angled in towards leg, driven towards mid-on
short of a length around off, opens the face towards point
short around off, pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
short of a length, opens the face to deep backward point
spins away a tad from a length, punched off the backfoot back to the bowler
pitched up on middle and off, clipped to midwicket
short around off, pushes back and cuts to point
short of a length, moves away but this is a slider that follows him, tucked to backward square leg
short of a length, spins away, tucked to midwicket.. fifty for Handscomb. He's Australia's only hope now
tucked off the hips to backward square
just back of a length, cuts him in half with extra bounce as he hangs back in the crease and opens the bat face
back of a length on off, defended into the surface
fuller on off, pushed into the covers for a quick one
shuffles across and punches down to long-on

short on middle and leg, pulled to deep backward square leg. Rayudu dives to his right at the deep but there's another fielder sprinting towards the ball. Seems like a part of his foot might have brushed against Rayudu. Ends up making contact with the boundary as well as he slides towards the ropes still in contact with the ball
pitched up on off, clipped to long-on
full and spinning away outside off, pushed out to point

pays the price for playing against the turn. Nicely looped in towards leg stump, temping him to close the face against the turn. Lands just short enough to muster up some turn and results in the batsman chipping it tamely to short midwicket as he closes the face
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
length, spins away, shuffles across and defends down the track
back of a length, angled in, walks across and tucks it fine for one
shortish outside off, lays into a pull to the left of deep midwicket
good length outside off, opens the face to third man
short of a length outside off, punched off the backfoot to the sweeper at cover
jabs at this short of a length delivery, tries to hack it over the midwicket boundary but doesn't quite get hold, lands well inside and Dhawan in the deep gets around it
short of a length, slanting in towards off, whipped wristily to deep midwicket
full and flat, middle and leg, pushed into the off side
looped up on middle and off, driven to cover
nicely flighted outside off, reaches out for a lavish drive, lands short of deep cover running to his right
has that carried to Chahal? Full and flat on middle, drilled back a tad uppishly, Chahal dives to his right but doesn't hold on
slower through the air, drilled away between mid-on and midwicket

shifts back to a length ball and tries to turn it away into the on side with the angle. But the ball skids on and straightens late to beat the closing face of the bat before pinning him in front of middle. That's plumb as a duck. Handscomb reviews. He's the last recognised batsman and so goes for it. Smashing middle of middle. Five wickets for Chahal.
slower short ball, waits on it and slaps it out to deep point
short ball, barely ducks as it goes over his front shoulder
full outside off, pushes into the covers and they jog for the single. Throw fired in at the striker's end. Direct hit would've had him out by miles, I reckon
nicely played. Opens the face to a fuller one and steers it fine to the third man boundary
short of a length, opens the face to point
inside-edge onto the pad as he tries to clip this fuller one that angles in
tossed up on middle, bunted back
sees the flight and goes for an extravgant drive but the ball slides in and takes a thick inside edge to midwicket
shortish, a bit of width, cut to point

and another one goes. Sixth wicket for Chahal, equals Agarkar's record for most wickets at the MCG by a visiting bowler. This one's nicely looped up and inviting him to come forward. Zampa charges down and swipes big without getting entirely underneath it and holes out to long-on
flighted on middle, Siddle gets forward and carefully blocks back
tucked to square leg
pitched up on a middle-stump line, pushed back
full around off, clipped to square leg's right
fuller of a length, pitches in front of the bat and sneaks underneath before going over the stumps. He was nowhere underneath that

and that will be a wrap. Shami pitches it full and straight on a leg stump line, Stanlake closes the face against the line and the ball goes straight through the bat, pings the pad and deflects onto the stumps
133kph, good length outswinger wide of off, he leaves this, it doesn't carry to Carey
135kph, good length, fourth stump line, hint of shape, he defends on the front foot
135kph, some width offered, he cuts hard through the vacant gully region to the wide third man
135kph, good length, inswinger, middle and off, he defends with the full face
136kph, good length, shaping into middle, he pushes on the front foot to mid on
137kph, back of a length on off, he defends from the crease to cover
131kph, short and wide, he cuts nicely but straight to Maxwell at point
good length off stump, 133kph, he defends on the front foot to mid on

big appeal for LBW given not out. Australia review. They burnt one early in Sydney. It's a fair delivery. Good length nipping back, hitting the back leg. No bat involved. Ball tracking had it hitting in line, and hitting but it's umpire's call! Hitting the top of the stumps but not more than 50 per cent according to Hawkeye. It stays Not out. But Australia keep the review!
good length, off stump line, he defends on the front foot
good length, wide of off, he leaves this alone
fuller outside off, he jams down keeping that out
good length on off, he defends from the crease
shorter, 136kph, a touch of width, he mistimes a cut straight to backward point
fuller outside off, 136kph, he drives mistiming it to mid off
full swinging into the pads, he clips this nicely behind square wide of fine leg for a couple
good length outside off, he pushes on the up to cover
back of a length on off, he is squared up a touch defending to cover
back of a length, wide of off, he runs this down to third man
fuller on off, 139kph, he drives to mid on but it's not well timed
fuller length on off, he drives on the up to straight mid on but Finch moves well to his right to cut it off
137kph, good length outside off, he drives flowingly but straight to mid off
136kph, good length, angled across, he leaves alone
136kph, good length, nipping back between bat and pad and just over off stump! Super delivery
full into leg stump, he clips this away easily over square leg, just turning the wrists, but the outfield is slow and it's a big boundary out there
139kph, good length fifth stump line, he is back and pushing this with an open face to point
good length, 136kph, he advances and checks the shot, defending to cover
136kph, full outside off, he drives slightly in the air but in the gap between mid off and cover, well placed, not nailed, they get three
135kph, back of a length, off stump, he defends from the crease with soft hands and plenty of time
136kph, back of a length outside off, he tries to force off the back foot but mistimes to mid off
138kph, good length outside off, he gets a nice stride in and defends to cover
136kph, he skips down and pushes to mid off, and goes with the stroke, Khawaja fumbles trying to gather and they get a single
135kph, full on pads and he clips this up and over square leg, nice timing, he gets enough of this to reach the rope this time!
135kph, good length, fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
good length, outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover

caught at first slip by Marsh! This was a fuller length angled into middle, he tried to whip this through midwicket, closed the face, got an outside edge that flew straight to Marsh at first slip and he held the catch well infront of his body.
135kph, fuller on off, he pushes back to the bowler
good length outside off, he leans into a pushed drive, places it wide of mid off for one
141kph, full outside off, he leaves decisively on the front foot
good length, 140kph, wide of off, he leaves again
136kph, back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to backward point
137kph, good length outside off, he defends on the front foot, rock solid, to cover
good length on leg, he tucks this off his pads through square leg
133kph, good length on off, he takes two steps down the track but defends into the off side
134kph, shorter length, fractionally wide, he cuts to wide third man for a single
135kph, fuller outside off, he drives in the air and just wide of Stoinis at cover, timing and placement beats the man and they get three
135kph, back of a length on leg, he glances this easily off his hip to fine leg
139kph, full on leg, he clips this nicely to the man at square midwicket
fuller on off, he drives on the up to mid off and runs with the stroke as Khawaja moves to his left to cut it off
shorter outside off, some extra bounce, Kohli controls it well, running this down to third man
good length on off, 141kph, he defends on the front foot to cover
137kph, good length outside off, he cuts from the crease straight to point
good length fourth stump line, he defends on the front foot
good length 141kph, off stump line, again he defends from the crease
135kph, yorker on off, he watchfully defends dropping the bat on it
140kph, back of a length outside off, he's up on his toes punching off the back foot to point
137kph, bouncer, well directed, he ducks underneath it quickly and easily
140kph, short and wide, he thrashes at a cut shot but is beaten by extra bounce. It flies through to Carey
138kph, back of a length fourth stump line, he defends off the back foot opening the face and knocking it into the vacant gully
good length outside off angled across, he gets an edge prodding forward but it bounces short of second slip. Soft hands from Shikhar
angled into leg stump, he clips this off his pads to fine leg
shorter length, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover-point
94kph, shorter length down leg, he is back and tucking this fine with lovely hands, they run brilliantly and get two
89kph tossed up on middle and leg, he drives firmly to long on
shorter outside off, he slices a cut past backward point wide of the sweeper for a couple
91kph, drifting in, a touch of turn, he defends on the front foot
143kph, back of a length outside off, he tries to knock it down to third man but chops it into the pitch and it runs to second slip
144kph, fuller length angled into middle and off, he pushes firmly on the front foot to mid on
fuller on off, he drives to Finch's left at mid off and takes the single, Finch throws and hits at the non-striker's but Kohli is home
142kph, back of a length a little bit wide of off, he runs this down to third man with the angle
142kph, good length outside off, he pushes on the front foot to cover-point

edge and dropped by Handscomb at slip! It flies away for four! Back of a length outside off, extra bounce and pace, he tried to run to third man, gets an edge that flies high to Handscomb's left, he gets two hands to it reaching up but it bursts through and flies away for four! Handscomb was beaten for pace as well
angled down leg, he glances to short fine who is right back on the circle
full leg break outside off, he square drives to deep cover-point
wrong un, 84kph, on middle, he picks it and drives to long off
shorter leg break, 89kph, on leg, he's back and working to midwicket
full outside off, he throws the hands at it square driving to deep point
quicker leg break, he's back and trying to work behind square, it hits the pad but it's going well down the leg side
141kph, short and wide and he gets on top of the bounce and smashes a cut shot forward of point! That's the adjustment from the best in the business
139kph, back of a length wide of off, he guides it on the bounce to a gully in place for that stroke
142kph, good length on off, he defends on the front foot to backward point
143kph, short on off, he is back quickly and swivels on a pull shot, places it brilliantly behind square and it flies away to the rope! Superb timing
140kph, good length wide of off, he looks to dab to third man but hits it straight to gully on the bounce
143kph, good length outside off, he defends on the front foot to cover
88kph leg break, nicely bowled, he skips out and defends with pad and bat together
full toss, he pulls this around through square leg but straight to the man at deep backward sqaure
87kph full leg break outside off, he drives to long off
flatter leg break, 90kph, he skips down the track and defends on the move to cover
shorter outside off, 89kph, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover-point
91kph top spinner on middle and leg, he clips this to midwicket
fuller on middle and leg, driven straight to mid-on
short ball around middle and off, swivel-pulls but doesn't quite get hold of it as it goes wide of deep midwicket
shortish outside off, the lack of pace isn't helping with the batsmen's timing, drags a pull to mid-on
back of a length on off, opens the face to gully
full on off, driven straight back
back of a length around off, shuffles across and tucks it into the vacant spaces at midwicket
shoritsh, slower and pitching outside leg, Dhawan turns around and pulls to deep backward square

chipped straight back. The lack of pace messes Dhawan's timing up. A length ball that sticks into the pitch. Dhawan is forward early and can only manage to gently knock it back towards Stoinis who does extremely well to snaffle it to his right with both hands. Needed some sharp reflexes there
dropped. Glenn Maxwell, that most electric of fielders! Would you believe it? Dhoni slashes at the sight of width and slaps it straight to him. Boy, Australia's day keeps getting worse
raps the pad now but appeal is withheld. Back of a length, cutting back into Dhoni who's playing all across it and gets pinned in front. Height? Could be. Drama, drama!
fuller outside off, reaches out and works it away to third man off the outside of the bat
off-cutter, on a length around off, Kohli presses forward and blocks
full outside off, eases forward into a drive through mid-off, extra cover gives it chase and cuts it off
short, wide, opens up and slashes it to cover-point
good length on off, defended solidly into the off side
short, walks across towards off and pulls along the ground to deep backward square
shortish outside off, gets the front leg up and across and gently pulls it into the midwicket region
inswinging yorker around off, Kohli digs it out in front of mid-on
good length, angled in towards off, Dhoni defends towards mid-on
length ball that cuts in, Dhoni barely manages to put bat to it as he defends
full outside off, not much backlift from Dhoni as he pushes forward for a gentle caress through the covers. Picked the gap nicely there
susses out the line early and walks across before clipping through square leg
length, cutting in towards off, defended
full around off, pushed off the inside of the bat towards mid-on
short, straightening outside off, rocks back and cuts behind point
comes down the track to a flat and fuller one and pushes it straight back
back of a length, subtly spinning away towards off, defended off the backfoot
shortish, sliding in, it's the wrong'un, Dhoni tries to pull but doesn't find the room he's looking for
full on middle, pushed to mid-on
advances to a low full toss and slaps it to deep cover
back of a length around off, advances and ends up knocking it to mid-on
slower ball, back of a length, inside-edged into the surface, almost chopped on

run out chance, missed. Dhoni drives this fuller one to extra cover. Dhoni gives a slight indication that he might be interested in the single. Kohli takes off and then Dhoni backs off, sending his captain back. Direct hit, and Kohli wasn't even in the frame
shortish, pulled with the angle behind square leg, and now they're back to their best running between the wickets, collecting three for it
full, shapes in and goes off the inside of the bat towards mid-on as Kohli drives
full, sliding and dips late, Dhoni reaches forward to drill it away wide of long-off

run out chance again Referred upstairs. But Dhoni might be safe, I reckon. Yup, full stretch forward, bat dragged along the ground and it saves him. This time Dhoni took off after Kohli carved a fuller one away to backward point. Kohli called but was ball-watching and eventually sends Dhoni back
pitched up outside off, opens up for a slap to sweeper cover
comes down the track to smother it
backs away and chops this into the surface as he doesn't get the room to free up his arms
short, a bit of width, cut late to backward point
full outside off, tails in late and Kohli blocks into the leg side off the inside of the bat
powerfully and wristily whips away this fuller one after moving across off to get behind the line
shot! Imperious from Dhoni. As if to say 'go fetch that'. Advances down the ground to a length ball and swats it away to the left of mid-on
slower length ball, a cutter on middle, defended back
full, curving in, pushed to mid-on off the inside of the bat
full on middle, clipped to midwicket
tossed up on off, driven out through the covers
subtle turn and lots of bounce outside off, left alone
drills a fuller one straight to cover
slider on middle and leg, defended down the track
short, makes some room and cuts through point
pitched up with lots of width, Kohli opens up and slaps it hard but Maxwell flings himself to his left and saves four
back of a length around off, defended
comes down the track and whips it away to the right of midwicket
short around off, doesn't get entirely on top of it but enough to pull it away through midwicket
short of good length outside off, nudged off the hips to square leg
comes down the track and drives but off the inside half of the bat towards mid-off
shortish outside off, rides the bounce and nudges it away to third man
the whip-lash cover drive! Kohli gets inside the line of a tossed up ball outside off and powers it through with a snap of his wrists
a little slower through the air, a little closer to  off stump, and that means Kohli leans forward and works it to long-on, again with a snap of his wrists
pokes the flighted delivery outside off to short cover
lets the deliciously full ball go outside off - and it's just within the wide line too. Excellent bowling from the legspinner
loops it up on middle, Dhoni pushes it down to long-off
rocks back to carve the shorter delivery on off stump - no turn on it - to the sweeper cover
fuller of a length outside off, flicked towards mid-on. A slight yes-and-no makes Marsh throw. He hits - with Dhoni inside - and they get the single off the deflection
length outside off, defended into the covers
short of a length, advances and nudges towards mid-on. Sets off for a quick one and beats Marsh diving with the throw at the bowler's end
short, bit of width, cut to deep cover
back of a length, cut late to point where Maxwell remains impregnable
short outside off, Dhoni pulls it to deep midwicket. Only a fielder at deep square leg, and it's well wide of him for them to come back for a third
back of a length outside off, punched to cover
fuller around off, pushed to cover
full around off, driven towards mid-off
short outside off, keeps the hands down and lets it go
back of a length around off, punched back
fuller around off, half-shuffles and pushes it into the covers. Maiden from Richardson
short and wide, cracked off the backfoot to deep point
tries to flick it with the inward angle and gets an inside edge to the pad
back of a length, stops a little on the surface, punched airily to mid-off

edged and over the keeper. The dots were building up so you could sense this was coming. Down the ground but it's too short for him comfort. Has a free swing and gets a thick nick past the outstretched right hand of the keeper

comes down the ground and swings for the fences again, this time looking to hack it over the leg side, and the ball sneaks underneath the bat. Ah, hang on.. not quite. It has taken a feather on the udneredge. Australia don't appeal, barring Maxwell at point. Another chance gone
very full on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
short and wide, slapped away to deep point
worked away to third man
fuller outside off, goes hard at it and knocks it back to the bowler off the inside of the bat
full, pushes away from the body for a brace behind point
edged and gone. Australia finally have a wicket. And it's BiiiiG! Kohli pushes way away from the body, Richardson tempting him with pace and width. Big, fat edge to Carey who holds on this time
full, angled into the pads, clipped to deep square leg
fuller of a length on middle, nudged to square leg
good length outside off, gets an inside edge onto the pad as he presses forward to defend
very full outside off, clipped towards mid-on
fullish outside off, nudged into the on side for a quick one
slower full ball, cautiously pushed into the off side
138kph, fuller outside off, he defends on the front foot
139kph yorker, he jams this out into the on side
137kph, fuller length, off stump, he pushes firmly on the front foot back to the bowler
139kph, short into the ribs, he swivels and pulls behind square into the gap between fine leg and deep square, two is on but Kedar slips at the non-striker's and it's only one
138kph, bouncer, angled down leg and called wide
135kph, back of a length outside off, he defends on the back foot to cover
133kph, bouncer, too high this time and called wide again
137kph, good length wide of off, he pushes off the back foot to cover
leg break pushed through on middle, he got an inside edge onto pad, they appeal but it's not out
89kph quicker ball, hurries him on the back foot and he defends into the leg side
86kph, leg break outside off, he reaches out and slog sweeps up and over midwicket, doesn't time it but gets a couple as long on comes around
leg break, good length outside off, he defends without much surety, comes off inside edge to short fine
drifting into leg, he turns this with the angle behind square
quicker, angled into middle and off, he sits back and defends
good length, top of off, he defends trying to get forward
good length outside off, 135kph, he pushes away from his body to point
140kph, full angled into off, he clips this behind square to deep square leg
138kph, shorter ball on off, he pulls this with control around to fine leg rolling the wrists
138kph shorter and wider, he cuts but doesn't time it, straight to Maxwell at point
short and wide and he picks the gap this time with the cut shot! It was wider and didn't bounce as much and he was able to place this between backward point and cover-point and it raced away.
leg break on off, he's back and pushing back to the bowler
leg break looped high outside off, he leaves this alone
shorter leg break, he's back and cutting hard to deep cover-point
slog sweeps from outside in the air and it just falls short of Richardson running in from deep square!
leg break, 84kph, slower and wide of off, he leaves this alone
tossed up wide of off, he drives firmly wide of long off and they push hard to pick up two
139kph, back of a length wide of off, it stays touch low, he tries to cut but it shoots under the bat
138kph, shorter outside off, he is back and running this down to third man with control
142kph, fuller length and he punches a drive on the up past cover, nice timing, it was no more than a push and they get three
133kph, bouncer wide of off, inside the guideline but it's called wide because it's too high
good length outside off, he's back and opening the face of the blade to run it to third man
back of a length, a touch of extra bounce, Dhoni controls it knocking to third man to rotate
138kph, full on leg stump, he overbalances a touch clipping this to midwicket
121kph, cutter back of a length on off, he's back and across and turning this to the gap at square leg
126kph, full and tailing in a bit to off stump, he turns this to midwicket on the front foot
125kph, good length on middle and leg, he works this with the wrists through forward square leg
129kph, back of a length outside off, he defends off the back dropping it down into the off side
he walks down the track to a 127kph short ball, adjusts and pulls down to fine leg
top edge flies fine of third man! He charges at a 127kph, short ball, swings hard and gets a top edge that flies over the vacant slip and fine of third man to the rope!
full on middle and leg, he whips this out through square leg to the sweeper
beaten attempting to run a 138kph lifting delivery outside off down to third man
138kph back of a length on off, he defends on the back foot into the off side
139kph, good length outside off, he presses forward and defends to point
135kph, fuller on off, he turns it with the angle through forward square leg
good length outside off, 136kph, he pushes easily on the front foot to the gap at cover-point. 50 for MS. His 70th in ODI cricket. Very subdued raising of the bat. He's not done yet
he walks at Stoinis who reacts and delivers a 128kph bouncer, it's too high and called wide
128kph, back of a length outside off, he shuffles forward and pushes this to cover
124kph, short ball, he pulls around the corner, gets a top edge that flies fine of Stanlake at fine leg and they get an easy two
128kph fuller outside off, he pushes slowly to Finch at mid off and somehow Dhoni scampers one to beat the throw. Incredible running
lofted over mid on! 127kph, half-volley outside off, he just punches the bottom hand through the line and lofts it over mid on, it lands just short of the rope
back of a length outside off, he defends from the crease into the off side
126kph, good length on off, he turns this with the angle around the corner to fine leg
good length outside off, he dabs this just past backward point, Kedar calls yes, there's a little bit of confusion but it beat the fielder and is an easy one
back of a length on off, catches Dhoni on the glove but he controls it towards fine leg
good length outside off, he pushes on the front foot to cover-point
139kph, back of a length outside off, he drives nicely off the back foot through cover, they get a couple
shorter ball outside off, he gets inside the line and just turns it to the circle at short fine, between three fielders running from three different spots, he sprints back for two
shorter outside off, he cuts off the back foot to point
shorter leg break on middle, he pulls well behind square, he pushes for two but Stanlake is on it quickly
88kph leg break on middle, he turns this against the spin to square leg
shorter leg break, he's back cutting past point and he sprints brilliantly for two. Great running
87kph, tossed up outside off, he pushes to cover
tossed up on off, he reaches out and turns this forward of square
top spinner on middle, he glances this with the angle to fine leg
135kph, good length outside off, he opens the face and runs this down to third man on the front foot
135kph, back of a length outside off, he's back and across and defending into cover-point

he's back and across, taken on the pad, Australia appeal, it's not out. They review. This looked high. It hit above the knee roll. No bat involved. He was hit on the top of the pads deep in the crease. Ball tracking says it's going over. Not out. Australia lose their review
134kph, bouncer, he ducks underneath it easily
138kph, good length on leg stump, he turns this to the man at forward square
139kph, fuller on off, he's back and across and glancing this to fine leg easily
121kph, slower ball outside off, he gets an inside edge just past off stump and it drops short of Carey!
124kph, good length outside off, he pushes from the crease back to the bowler
127kph, good length top of off, he turns this straight to midwicket who is in saving one
125kph, short and wide, he cuts nicely, placing it between short third man and backward point, it doesn't reach the rope but they get three

run out chance and Maxwell misses! But Dhoni would have got home! How quick is he! it was tucked to Maxwell's right at midwicket, he gathered in the one hand and fired at the striker's and missed but Dhoni got there. Great running
wide of off, he's back and cutting through point
leg break on off, he is forward and defending
full leg break on middle, he reaches out and defends
flatter leg break, he defends on the front foot again!
faster leg break on middle and off, he pushes on the front foot to cover
leg break on middle, he just defends with the full face to midwicket
shorter length on leg, he is back and tucking it behind square for a single
108kph, short slower ball, he tries to pull over midwicket, mistimes it down to long on
shorter length on off, he tucks this through square leg
127kph, full angled into middle, he clips this to midwicket but can't find the gap
he gloves a pull shot fine! He charged down the track, got a shorter ball, he pulls of the gloves and double hits it, scooping it fine of fine leg for four! Stanlake can't make the diving save
back of a length on middle, he whips behind square, pushes for two, but it's not there
125kph, shorter length on off, he turns this off the back foot to wide fine leg
full toss fired wide down leg
steps down the track and lasers a drive wide of mid off! What a shot! Half-volley admittedly but he nails a drive past mid off. Superb.
139kph, full toss fired wide down leg!
very full, 134kph, on leg, he turns this behind square wide of fine leg, Kedar takes on the throw coming back for two and gets there!
full into leg stump, he glances this to wide fine leg but there's no two here
full outside off, he pushes through cover-point
136kph, low full toss on middle, he sits deep and steers this with an open blade through the gap at cover-point
135kph, yorker on off, well bowled, Dhoni squeezes it out
he shapes to paddle sweep, Richardson fires in a 138kph, yorker, brilliantly bowled, Kedar just bunts this into the leg side
135kph, short ball, he pulls powerfully along the ground but straight to deep square
140kph full toss outside off, he shuffles down and works this towards long on, they run the first hard but there's no two
short slower ball, he pulls around the corner to the circle behind square, Carey sprints from behind the stumps to cut off two
he gets down on knee to a full ball outside off and slog sweeps in the air but it's short of Maxwell coming in from deep midwicket!
119kph, shorter slower ball on leg, he pulls behind square to deep fine

dropped by Finch at mid off and Jadhav is nearly run out!! He lasered this at mid off at waist high and Finch moving left dropped it, it bounced away, and they pushed for two Jadhav came back, dives and just makes his ground as Stoinis breaks the stumps! The third umpire takes an eternity to check it but he just beat the throw with a dive. He was in by a frame! Incredible
sweeps a slower ball full toss wide of fine leg!
slower ball, pulls this behind square for a single
slower ball, hits him on the thigh, bounced into the off side
on leg stump, he turns this through square leg

slashed wide of backward point! 50 for Jadhav! Wide full toss, he walked down the track, Stoinis fired wide, he slashes this wide of backward point and it races to the rope. Third man can't cut it off
full on leg stump, 134kph, he turns this down to fine leg with ease
114kph, slower ball outside off, he backs away given room and lofts this up and over cover with ease! Superb batting! No one back on the off side and Siddle missed his spot
he backs away walking down, Siddle fires in a perfect yorker, he just jams it out
brilliant skill to slice a leg stump full toss up and over backward point, incredible hands to do it, he can't get it to the rope but they get three
full toss fired down the leg side again
driven straight of mid off! Dhoni times this chase to perfection! He got the ball he wanted and nails it straight of mid off who is in the circle and it flies to the boundary! The fans are ecstatic
full yorker on middle, he digs it out to midwicket
yorker on off, he digs this out calmly
chips this wide of mid on and away to the rope! Length ball on off and he chips it in the air and into the gap!
